definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
lit. interrelated as bones and flesh (idiom); inseparably related/closely intertwined
close kindred slaughter one another (idiom); internecine strife
as close as flesh and bones (idiom); deep friendship
feelings deeper than for one's own flesh and blood (idiom)/deep friendship

sentences.english: Conclusions Caffine had remarkable enhancement effect in cisplatin—induced apoptosis of osteosarcoma cell and osteosarcoma cases.
sentences.chinese: 結論咖啡因有促進順鉑誘導骨肉瘤細胞凋亡的作用。

sentences.english: Conclution Intervention and radiation are better therapies and as the ferst therapy for treatment osteosarcoma in limbs.
sentences.chinese: 結論介入加放療是肢體骨肉瘤的較好治療方法。

sentences.english: She had a true sisterly feeling for her brother.
sentences.chinese: 她對兄長懷有真正的骨肉之情。

sentences.english: The child in whose veins flows the blood of William Turner? where?
sentences.chinese: 那個威廉特納的親生骨肉呢？

sentences.english: The bulk of people who get osteogenesis sarcoma are below age 21.
sentences.chinese: 大多數骨肉瘤患者的年齡在21歲以下。

sentences.english: I must help my brother and sister because they're my own flesh and blood.
sentences.chinese: 須幫助我的弟弟和妹妹，因爲他們是我的親骨肉。

sentences.english: This is a radiograph of an osteosarcoma involving the metaphyseal region of the distal femur.
sentences.chinese: 線顯示股骨遠端幹骺區的骨肉瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To study the killing effect of Zijin powder extract on human osteosarcoma cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥紫金散對人骨肉瘤細胞的殺傷作用。

sentences.english: I must help them because they're my own flesh and blood.
sentences.chinese: 我必須幫助他們，因爲他們都是我的親骨肉。

sentences.english: My favorite part of the chicken is the wish bone.
sentences.chinese: 我最愛喫雞的胸叉骨肉。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she is thy father's near kinswoman .
sentences.chinese: 不可露你姑母的下體，她是你父親的骨肉之親。

sentences.english: It seems to be the instinct of certain wretched families to break the thread.
sentences.chinese: 斷盡骨肉關係好象是某些窮苦人家的本能。

sentences.english: The conventional treatment of osteogenic sarcoma is a high amputation as well as disarticulation.
sentences.chinese: 骨肉瘤的傳統療法是高位截肢，關節離斷。

sentences.english: The result supports a crucial role for the RB gene in the etiology of osteosarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 這進一步提示RB基因在骨肉瘤病因中的作用。

sentences.english: The most common malignant primary bone tumors are osteosarcomas.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的惡性原發性骨腫瘤是骨肉瘤。

sentences.english: Mestatatic osteosarcomas usually involve the right side of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 轉移性骨肉瘤通常累及右心。

definition: lit. interrelated as bones and flesh (idiom); inseparably related/closely intertwined
one's own (child) (i.e. one's child by birth)/biological (parents)/birth (parents)
hands and feet/(fig.) brothers/retinue, henchmen, accomplices
blood is thicker than water/fig. family ties are closer than social relations
one's own flesh and blood (idiom); closely related
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
a tiger, though cruel, will not devour its cubs (idiom)/even wild beasts look after their young
